SEARCH
Package com.example.a1_jubair_6_frontend.managers

Class NotificationDataManager

java.lang.Object
com.example.a1_jubair_6_frontend.managers.NotificationDataManager
public class NotificationDataManager extends Object
Manages the notification settings for the application. It allows the user to configure and toggle various types of notifications, including system notifications, time-based notifications, reminder notifications, SMS notifications, and email notifications. Settings are stored in SharedPreferences to persist across app sessions.
Author:
Caleb Sanchez, Alexander Svobodny

  • Constructor Details

    • NotificationDataManager

      public NotificationDataManager(android.content.Context context)
      Initializes the NotificationDataManager instance with the provided context.
      Parameters:
      context - the context of the application, used to access SharedPreferences.

  • Method Details

    • getProfileDataManager

      public ProfileDataManager getProfileDataManager()
      Retrieves the associated ProfileDataManager instance.
      Returns:
      the ProfileDataManager instance for managing user profile data.

    • saveNotificationSettings

      public void saveNotificationSettings(boolean systemEnabled, boolean timeEnabled, boolean reminderEnabled)
      Saves the notification settings, including system, time, and reminder notifications.
      Parameters:
      systemEnabled - whether system notifications are enabled.
      timeEnabled - whether time notifications are enabled.
      reminderEnabled - whether reminder notifications are enabled.

    • getSystemNotificationsEnabled

      public boolean getSystemNotificationsEnabled()
      Retrieves the current setting for system notifications.
      Returns:
      true if system notifications are enabled, false otherwise.

    • getTimeNotificationsEnabled

      public boolean getTimeNotificationsEnabled()
      Retrieves the current setting for time-based notifications.
      Returns:
      true if time-based notifications are enabled, false otherwise.

    • getReminderNotificationsEnabled

      public boolean getReminderNotificationsEnabled()
      Retrieves the current setting for reminder notifications.
      Returns:
      true if reminder notifications are enabled, false otherwise.

    • getSMSNotificationsEnabled

      public boolean getSMSNotificationsEnabled()
      Retrieves the current setting for SMS notifications.
      Returns:
      true if SMS notifications are enabled, false otherwise.

    • getEmailNotificationsEnabled

      public boolean getEmailNotificationsEnabled()
      Retrieves the current setting for email notifications.
      Returns:
      true if email notifications are enabled, false otherwise.

    • toggleSystemNotifications

      public void toggleSystemNotifications()
      Toggles the state of system notifications, and disables time and reminder notifications if system notifications are turned off.

    • toggleTimeNotifications

      public void toggleTimeNotifications()
      Toggles the state of time notifications, ensuring that system notifications are enabled before allowing time notifications to be toggled.

    • toggleReminderNotifications

      public void toggleReminderNotifications()
      Toggles the state of reminder notifications, ensuring that system notifications are enabled before allowing reminder notifications to be toggled.

    • toggleSMSNotifications

      public void toggleSMSNotifications()
      Toggles the state of SMS notifications.

    • toggleEmailNotifications

      public void toggleEmailNotifications()
      Toggles the state of email notifications.

    • updateNotificationSettingsToServer

      public void updateNotificationSettingsToServer()
      Updates the notification settings to the server. This method is a placeholder and should be implemented with server communication logic to synchronize the settings with the backend.

    • fetchNotificationSettings

      public void fetchNotificationSettings()
      Fetches the notification settings from the server. This method is a placeholder and should be implemented with server communication logic to fetch the settings from the backend.

    • clearNotificationSettings

      public void clearNotificationSettings()
      Clears all saved notification settings from SharedPreferences.
